sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO2 (IDX, NAME, USERID, PASS, PASSQUESTION, PASSREPLY, EMAIL1, EMAIL2, PHONE1, PHONE2, PHONE3, WIREAGENCY, SELLPHONE1, SELLPHONE2, SELLPHONE3, ZIPCODE1, ZIPCODE2, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, USERGRADE, BANK, ACCOUNT, REGIP, REGDATE) VALUES (SEQ_USERINFO2_IDX.nextval, #NAME#, #USERID#, #PASS#, #PASSQUESTION#, #PASSREPLY#, #EMAIL1#, #EMAIL2#, #PHONE1#, #PHONE2#, #PHONE3#, #WIREAGENCY#, #SELLPHONE1#, #SELLPHONE2#, #SELLPHONE3#, #ZIPCODE1#, #ZIPCODE2#, #ADDRESS1#, #ADDRESS2#, #USERGRADE#, #BANK#, #ACCOUNT#, #REGIP#, #REGDATE#)
